## Introduction

Soil salinity affects germination and seedling growth

```{r}
salinity <- c(0,50,100,150)
germination <- c(95,82,60,40)
plot(salinity, germination, type="b", col = "darkgreen",
     main="The Plot",
     xlab="NaCl concentration (mM)",
     ylab="Germination (%)")
```


```{r, echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(mtcars, aes(x=hp, y=mpg)) + geom_point()
```
